filming_locations: 380 South San Rafael Avenue, Pasadena, California, USA
plot: 4 young friends set out on an adventure. Geordie, Chris, Teddy and Vern go looking for the missing body of a local teenager - found by a gang of older boys. A story of boys hangin' out and growin' up.
title: Stand by Me
plot_simple: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.
